channel.title: Can i? (yes/no) if yes, how?
channel.description:
~My question~
Can i make it when the player starts they start as a npc?
NOTE: i dont mean typing in ::pnpc
If yes: Please try and post how i can achive this not just say yes.
If no: Thanks for helping out.
Thanks alot.
ImJammy780[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 12:29:54 PM[/size][hr]does anybody no? please help me :S
